fields.Title of Presentation: AI-Proofing Your Discussion Prompts: Encouraging Authentic Conversations
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: International Institute of Education, Research and Development
fields.Sponsoring Organization: International Institute of Education, Research, and Development
fields.Description/Abstract: This interactive presentation examined ways that artificial intelligence is currently being used by students, proposed solutions for dealing with AI, and then, in an interactive session, participants discussed ways that they would incorporate use of AI into their own online course discussions.
